medical_history.chief_complaint: Isolated right lower quadrant abdominal pain for 3 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports that the abdominal pain began 3 days ago without any known trauma or associated symptoms such as fevers, chills, nausea, vomiting, or diarrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypothyroidism; Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS) with loose stools; possible self-reported overactive bladder; history of C6-C7 disc herniation from a car accident.
